title: Green beans with Cashew with Yummi Nuts Cashew with Salt
ingredients: 1 pound green beans, cleaned and peeled
1 package of Yummi Nuts Cashew with Salt
instructions: Step 1: Pour a cup of water into a pot with the salt and place a steaming basket on top. Heat over medium high heat and bring to a boil.
Step 2: Place the beans, cover and cook for 8 minutes.
Step 3: While the beans are cooking, heat the butter in a skillet over medium heat and brown the garlic and cashew seeds.
Step 4: Add the honey, stir and serve on top of the green beans.
